talk.author: did:plc:7vejuxngcckvi5lyx2qhareb
talk.utter: So honest question- nobody wants someone checking genitals and weird stuff like that, so what SHOULD be the answer? I've seen a lot of terrible solutions but no good ones. Surely there has to be some standard beyond self identification right?

talk.author: did:plc:3vyl2i7k2fuk7lbnmlxh3vof
talk.utter: criteria for how long trans women need to be on medically monitored hormone therapy before they can compete in women's leagues have existed for more than a decade and were approved by a number of regulatory bodies in sports and medicine in the early 00's

talk.author: did:plc:7vejuxngcckvi5lyx2qhareb
talk.utter: I honestly had no idea, but that seems reasonable. What about at lower levels like high schools where kids might not even have access to hormone therapy at all? Does that already apply at the high school level?
